World Monster Federation Series One Tournament Announcements: Four Classes
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Coliseum (Public Monster Rancher Tournaments): World Monster Federation (MR2 Tourneys): Tournament Announcements: World Monster Federation Series One Tournament Announcements: Four Classes
By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, July 6, 2005 - 02:40 pm:

Here are the detailed guidelines:

1) Monsters be any age.

2) Monsters may be from CDs, Market, DNA or combination.

3) Techs are up to you.

4) Limit 2 entries per person.

5) The Classes are as followed:



Lightweight- 80-90 comp.

Middleweight- 91-101

Heavyweight- 102-112

Super Heavyweight- 110-120 (If falls in 110-112 category, may enter in both)


Guidelines for Submission:

1) Entrants must follow all general tourney rules outlined in the main Coliseum Guidelines for Entrants. No one under 13 allowed to submit, no cheat devices except to make DNA, no wagering.

2) When you have your monster ready, email me at gogators(at)legendcup.com requesting a save slot. I will reply and assign you a save slot. You will then need to make a save on that slot with your monster in the freezer and email the Dex Drive save to me.

3) The tourney will be held in the MRM chatroom, Master Rancher's Lodge #47, at a time to be announced later.

4) Any questions about this event should be posted in the Locker Room.
